instruction: Summarize the article about the innovation policy response to the Covid-19 pandemic.
output: The article discusses the innovation policy response to the Covid-19 pandemic. It suggests the creation of milestone-based subsidies to expedite the development of Covid-19 related technologies such as drugs, diagnostics, and vaccines. The article also looks at the policies and funding programs of the World War II era U.S. Office of Scientific Research and Development (OSRD) and finds that crisis times' need for quick results suggests prioritizing applied research, encouraging redundancy, and loosening appropriability guidelines. The article suggests that the Covid-19 pandemic has accelerated innovation and patenting in fields related to Covid-19 treatment and vaccine deployment with a focus on practical applications over further theoretical groundwork.
